entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
